CHAT.comment: DANIEL GIRMAI NEGUSIE, Petitioner v. MICHAEL B. MUKASEY, ATTORNEY GENERAL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:04 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF ANDREW J. PINCUS ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF GREGORY G. KATSAS ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF ANDREW J. PINCUS ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
